invalidJava.message: Click to use another java to launch.

struct.assets: Same with vanilla. The assets folder cache the game assets
struct.forge-versions: The global cache of Forge version metadata
struct.java: The global cache of found java
struct.lite-versions: The global cache of Liteloader version metadata
struct.mods: Mods folder. Containing all the enabled mods of this modpack
struct.profile: The JSON store launch profile config
struct.profileFolder: The folder contains a specific launch profile. The name is the uuid
struct.profiles: The folder contains each launch profile
struct.resourceJson: The resource metadata matching one mod or resourcepack
struct.resourcepacks: ResourcePack folder. Containing all the resource pack of this modpack
struct.resources: The folder contains the managed mods/resourcepacks metadata
struct.root: The root the your minecraft data folder
struct.temp: The temp folder (for download) the Launcher have
struct.version: The global cache of Minecraft version metadata
struct.versions: Same with vanilla. Save multiple versions' JSON & JAR

blocked.description: There are still some unresolveable issues existed. They might impact the launch workflow, but you can still let Minecraft have a try.

failed.description: There is no crash report. This this the error log and latest log.
failed.generalText: If you encounter this several times, please contact author!

failed.title: Game Exited with Abnormal Code
failed.unresolvableProblemsText: Existed some problems cannot be resolved. If you cannot handle this, please contact author for help!
